content.description: Sit start with hands matched in the crack, pull on and work a couple of moves up the crack. From the top of the crack, move left out to a sloped jug on the left arete of the boulder, match it up, and rock over the left side of the boulder to top out.
content.location: Approach Super Crack 2 Area, hike up the hillside along the large boulder running along the hill. The Supermoon boulder is about halfway up and has a very clear face; The Hubble boulder is just behind Supermoon, still along the hillside.

content.description: The Hubble boulder is a very small part of the cliff that has a nice crack running right up the middle of it. There is potential another line or two that could be squeezed in.
